plot: An orphan is adopted into a hostile family environment. She harbors an undiscovered artistic talent, which helps to catapult her into the lives of two men.
plot_en: An orphan is adopted into a hostile family environment. She harbors an undiscovered artistic talent, which helps to catapult her into the lives of two men.
plot_es: An orphan is adopted into a hostile family environment. She harbors an undiscovered artistic talent, which helps to catapult her into the lives of two men.
title: Byeoleun nae gaseume
